document.full_text: nokia, the world's top cellphone maker by volume, is more confident that it will not need to write down its $8.1 billion navteq acquisition, a corporate filing showed on friday.
document.title: nokia more confident on navteq
lines_and_colors: nokia, the world's top cellphone maker by volume, is more confident that it will not need to write down its $8.1 billion navteq acquisition, a corporate filing showed on friday.
